name: Virtual Product Design  NFT Camera Collection V2

metadata.name: jizo™️  / detail #001
metadata.description:
Virtual Product Design ™️
( Item : Camera ＋ EVF )

This is the world's first NFT Camera Collection. As a former employee at a camera manufacturer, he is the first product designer to pioneer the field of Virtual Product Design™️
This project explores the possibilities of designing new products that are distinct from objects in the real world.
The virtual products he creates have parts floating in mid-air, or use high-quality exterior designs that are difficult to achieve at real-world prices.
Only with his extensive experience in creating actual products in the real world is he able to gain mastery over these products residing in between reality and the virtual realm. It is also possible to make these 3D data as objects and hold exhibitions.
Please enjoy these works, which have been crafted with meticulous attention to detail, for yourself.
